Interface IContactInformationFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactInformationFormatter

    public interface IContactInformationFormatter

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void formatContactInformation(java.lang.String fileName)
      overridden formats the contact info in one of the files
      void formatEmail(java.lang.String Email)
      overridden formats one email address

      formats one name

      overridden read contact info from a list of files, given file paths

    • Method Detail

      • readContactInformation

        void readContactInformation(java.lang.String[] filePaths)
        overridden read contact info from a list of files, given file paths
        Parameters:
        filePaths - an array of strings with the names of the files/file paths to be used

      • formatContactInformation

        void formatContactInformation(java.lang.String fileName)
        overridden formats the contact info in one of the files
        Parameters:
        fileName - a string, the name of the file

      • formatEmail

        void formatEmail(java.lang.String Email)
          throws EmailAddressFormatException
        overridden formats one email address
        Parameters:
        Email - a string, the email address to be formatted
        Throws:
        EmailAddressFormatException - an exception to be thrown in the case of an email not being properly formatted

      • formatPhoneNumber

        void formatPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                throws PhoneNumberFormatException
        overridden formats one phone number
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - a string, the phone number to be formatted
        Throws:
        PhoneNumberFormatException - exception to be thrown if phone number is not in the correct format

      • formatName

        void formatName(java.lang.String name)
         throws NameFormatException
        formats one name
        Parameters:
        name - a string, the name to be formatted
        Throws:
        NameFormatException - exception to be thrown if name is not formatted properly
